newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends down 3.3 vs dlr at 1,075.00.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends down 3.3 vs dlr at 1,075.00.

text.p: BOGOTA, May 8 Reuter - Colombia's peso cut its intraday losses and ended down just 3.3 pesos against the dollar at 1,075.00, interbank dealers said.

The peso slipped to a low of 1,080.40 in trading shortly after midday, weighed down by a speculative surge in demand for U.S. currency, dealers said. But they said dollar sellers jumped into the market once the peso fell through the 1,080.00 barrier, letting the peso rebound on a fresh supply of greenbacks.

"Generally, what we were seeing was the foreign exchange rate being manipulated by banks squaring their positions," one trader said, adding there was nothing on the fundamental side to move the market.
Dealers reported 555 trades for an above-average total of $251 million.
